Articles.Content:
My last replica before server migration, forget Me 262, this is the best .... design imho. 66 parts all stock flies realistically. Enjoy :)


P.s. This craft was a lot harder to build than you could think.

There is no need for a ladder, to enter cockpit just walk near a wing and climb with (F)

[img]http://i.imgur.com/hiK079Y.jpg[/img]

[imgur]NhCiz[/imgur]



[SIZE=4][URL="http://www./download/dz03i54981yv4jy/FW_ta_283_By_Eorin_1_0_5.craft"]DOWNLOAD[/URL][/SIZE] Edited November 25, 2015 by eorin

2 questions-
where is the download and how do you start a new thread?
Hah! That's awesome. I always liked those crazy looking WW2 German planes for some reason.

UPDATE: better fuselage look
